thread.title: Rob Kardashian celebrates Dream turning three months old | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Rob Kardashian celebrates Dream turning three months old | Daily Mail Online

author: Sameer Suri For Dailymail.Com
title: Rob Kardashian celebrates Dream turning three months old | Daily Mail Online
text: comments She's only three months old, but Dream Kardashian's already learned how to celebrate in style. Her father Rob Kardashian posted an adorable Instagram photo on Friday of her wearing a Chanel baby sweater and fuzzy pink cardigan. 'Today my baby girl is 3 months old and I'm in love with her,' he wrote of his firstborn child by his fiancée Blac Chyna . 'Today my baby girl is 3 months old': Rob Kardashian posted an adorable Instagram photo of his baby daughter Dream Kardashian lying in bed in a Chanel baby sweater and pink cardigan Though little Dream is Rob's only tyke, Chyna's also got a four-year-old son called King Cairo by Tyga , who's now dating Rob's half-sister Kylie Jenner . The Rob & Chyna co-stars have been an item since last January, publicized their engagement that April and announced her pregnancy the following month. They briefly separated in December, Rob posting an emotional Snapchat video saying his bride-to-be had vacated their home with their baby. Starting a family: The three-month-old is Rob's firstborn child by his fiancée Blac Chyna, whom he began dating last January and with whom he announced his engagement that April The couple have managed a rapprochement since then, but People quoted a source on Thursday who's said: 'They are together, but not living together.' Calling the arrangement 'bizarre,' the source indicated: 'They are still engaged and Chyna wears her ring. There haven’t been any wedding talks though.' To hear the source tell it, 'One of their main issues is that Rob doesn’t trust her. Even rumors of Chyna getting close to other guys, will cause another epic fight.' Doting father: The Rob & Chyna co-stars publicized her pregnancy last May, and wound up welcoming Dream into the world on November 10 On Tuesday, Page Six claimed Chyna was seen getting rather close to another man at The MA Theatre in Los Angeles on Super Bowl Sunday. The site quoted a source who's averred that 'I would definitely have thought they were a couple if didn’t know better.' To hear that source tell it, Chyna called herself 'faded' and told another guest at the viewing party that 'she’s still talking to Rob but they’re not living together right now.' Meanwhile, per the Page Six insider, the man she'd gotten close with 'at some point had his hand in her lap or on her legs.' 'They are still engaged and Chyna wears her ring': People quoted a source on Thursday who's said: 'They are together, but not living together' Share or comment on this article 393
